isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - FRONT DRIVE AXLE: SPICER S-9000 - REMOVAL OF CARRIER FROM AXLE HOUSING

svcproc.title: REMOVAL OF CARRIER FROM AXLE HOUSING

warning.para: To protect eyes, the use of safety glasses during disassembly-assembly procedures is recommended.

step1.para: If removal of complete axle assembly is required to service differential carrier, refer to OEM manual for this procedure.
Remove drain plug and drain lubricant.
At this time, remove wheel ends and axle shafts. Follow procedures outlined in this manual.
Remove carrier bolts and lockwashers from housing.

note.para: If axle assembly is still in vehicle, be sure carrier assembly is securely supported before it is separated from housing.

step1.para: Break carrier loose from housing. It may be necessary to use pry bars behind carrier flange mounting face.
Remove carrier and mount in suitable holding fixture such as a carrier repair stand.
